amendment.description: To provide foreign assistance through a Millennium Challenge Account.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2017 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2017 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S13367) To provide foreign assistance through a Millennium Challenge Account.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2017 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2017 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lugar.
